scripts.mysqldump:full: docker exec -t mysql_rest-api-node-express mysqldump -u root --databases app > ./mysql/sql/full.sql
scripts.mysqldump:schema: docker exec -t mysql_rest-api-node-express mysqldump -u root --databases app --no-data | sed -e 's/ AUTO_INCREMENT=[0-9]*//' > ./db/sql/1_schema.sql
scripts.mysqldump:data: docker exec -t mysql_rest-api-node-express mysqldump -u root -t --databases app --no-create-db > ./db/sql/2_data.sql
